root:
Abysswalker Abysswalkers follow the tradition of the legendary Wolf Knight who was said to have conquered the abyss and saved a princess. They exist to slay all related monstrosities in honored memory of the Wolf Knight. Like their predecessor, they are unmatched with greatswords. Their weaponry and armor are fashioned after the Wolf Knight's. Their weapons are blessed to slay agents of the abyss and their spawn, and their armor remains light for movement.
Heroic Struggle
Heroic Struggle
Heroic Struggle
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The tradition of the Wolf, the Abysswalker, teaches an aggressive yet evasive set of skills for dispatching agents of the abyss. Their mobility allows evasion of conventional attacks. Renowned for their loyalty, they will embrace the Abyss if it means saving a comrade's life.
He inspires allies with his loyalty by overcoming the Abyss, or gains strength by welcoming it.
The wolf requires a worthy foe! At least I'm not guarding a princess...
Darkwraith's Bane Savage Leap Loyalty Swordsman's Gambit Gliding Thrust Wrath of the Abyss Gliding Slash Abyssal Imbuement Savage Strike Hurricane Swing Darkwraith's Bane Savage Leap Loyalty Swordsman's Gambit Gliding Thrust Wrath of the Abyss Gliding Slash Savage Strike Hurricane Swing

+5 stress healed when afflicted Extra Stress Healed When Afflicted More Stress, More Damage Gain Unique Bonuses When Afflicted Shard of the Abyssal Father The Abyss corrupts all it touches, granting extreme stress. Only an Abysswalker can utilize this properly. When afflicted, Abysswalkers gain speed, protection, and strength in pure darkness. Greatly enhanced damage against Eldritch and Unholy. Noble Corrupted Lord's Blade
Unmatched with the greatsword, this warrior would surely aid your endeavors. He hunts the Dark itself. Abysswalker's Legacy
Salvation
Corrupted Noble

I will halt the Abyss!

not Lord's Blade Lord's Blade not Abysswalker Abysswalker
If I can fight with one limp and bloody arm, you can stop squirming! Let me tell you about my wolf... T'is only a flesh wound! Trust me, I've known worse!
We'll be fine. I've got both arms, now! We'll halt this odd land's abyss! I'll guard you with my life. I swear it.
If you move this way, they'll likely miss... A knight is defined by his loyalty and service. To that end, even you can become one! If it looks bad, take this shield...
I know nary a murmur of dark. I hunt Darkwraiths. This is no trouble. Through battle with Dark, I become Dark.
The darkness left my memories blurred... but I remember you. I miss you, my dearest companion... We were together, then. *Sigh* I have no regrets... such is duty.
*Looks upon his hands.* The Abyss will win, eventually. The Light requires kindling, and I'm nearly spent. The pain returns. *Clutches his left arm.*
I only have one, but I swear the Chosen Undead had ninety-nine. Not sure how he earned that many. Reminds me of Anor Londo. My arm's not so bad, any more.
...
My companion-- HE'S DEAD! This concerns a man with time on the clock. Twelve tolls for me, soon. Only one wolf remains.
Back to the Abyss! The twain shan't unite whilst my blade remains bitwixt. Send them back. Begone, foul creature! Perhaps the Abyss can be abated... I know nary a murmur of dark!
Soon, I may be consumed. Do not aid your potential enemy. Don't throw your food away. I might not make it. Not yet! Rrrrgh! Don't throw your food away. I might not make it. Not yet! I have availed you nothing... I have availed you nothing... Focus! Focus! Focus! Murmurs... Murmurs of Dark! Focus! The light fades... The battle never ends. Once, I lost my Silver Pendant. It was the end of me. Don't trust it. Was it contaminated? The Dark-- it surrounds us! I keep swinging, but the Dark creeps ever onward. ... a darkwraith? Here? No! We end the Abyss here, or no one else will! ... I can't. An unwise step. A trivial attempt to halt the Dark. I have availed you nothing... Darkness, consume me... Do not aid a potential enemy! Darkness consume me... Don't risk losing the effort on me. I have become the enemy... Flee, mortals! Victory or defeat... will I remain? Do not accept the void. See through to holy Anor Londo. Surely thine kind are more than pure Dark! I have availed you nothing... Surely thine kind are more than pure Dark! I walk the Abyss where none may tread. Do not stare upon the Abyss, but drift through it. You know murmurs of Dark. It will save you. Anor Londo lives in me. Thou art more than pure dark! Be prepared for sacrifice-- the cost is well worth purity. My strength is yours! The Abyss will never leave here. The Dark recedes with each step! Hope shines within the Abyss! You should not be here! Flee, mortals! Only darkness... Do not tarry-- flee! Surely, you must not stay! I cannot restrain myself for long! I... I don't see the flame. My Lord, the Dark cannot be halted. I wasn't strong enough. Forgive me. This arm wills not what I ought! Flee, before I am corrupted! The longer you fight, the sooner it wins. Abandon this madness! The Abyss is too strong! It will consume you if you tarry. Retreat! I'll hold them off. Go! I refuse to spread the Abyss. No. I must face the Dark. No effect. No use. It's ineffective. Don't waste your resources. Just go. Now is your chance-- leave me.
------------
深渊行者 传说中,狼骑士击败了深渊,拯救了一位公主.而深渊行者就是狼骑士的后继者们所创立的骑士团.他们猎杀着世间所有与深渊有关的异形鬼怪,以此纪念伟大的狼骑士.他们的巨剑被施与祝福以对抗深渊之物,他们的护甲则为了行动力而保持轻便.
英雄的挣扎
英雄的挣扎
英雄的挣扎
不,他的使命在别处,而我属于这里. 不,他的使命在别处,而我属于这里.
狼骑士,深渊漫步者,火的拯救者,给他的后人留下了一套专门用以对付深渊生物的剑技,充满侵略性又难以应付.同时依靠着这种剑技强大的机动性,让使用者能够轻易地回避常规的攻击.而且深渊行者骑士团以忠诚闻名.他们愿意为拯救同伴生命付出一切,即使是拥抱深渊.
他们通过忠诚激励战友.他们冲锋在对抗深渊的最前线.在必要的时候,他们愿意拥抱深渊以获得力量,在被吞噬之前用这种力量去保护战友..或是竭尽所能地毁灭敌人..
狼渴求着有价值的对手! 至少我不用看守公主...

其他:
我将阻止深渊!
伤口包扎 激励 鼓舞士气 深渊漫步 往昔回忆 拥抱深渊 女神的祝福
Covenant of Artorias 狼之戒 银项链 狼骑士的决意 Cleansing Greatshield Blue Abyssal Tear Red Abyssal Tear Greatsword of the Legend Abyssal Taint
not Lord's Blade Lord's Blade not Abysswalker Abysswalker
我就算断了一只手了也能坚持战斗,你能不能别哀嚎了! 我来给你讲一个狼骑士的传奇故事吧... 这不过是皮肉之伤,相信我,我见过更糟的.
我们会没事的,我两只手都在呢! 我们会将深渊遏于此地! 我会以我的生命保护你.我发誓.
如果你像这样移动..他们就很难打到你了. 骑士的座右铭,就是忠诚与奉献.你或许也够格成为一位骑士. 如果情况变糟的话,拿上这块盾牌.
我了解那黑暗的低语之声... 我专门猎杀深渊之物,这不算什么. 在与黑暗战斗的过程里,我也遁入了其中.
黑暗让我的记忆模糊...但我记得你. 我很想念你,我的朋友... 我们曾如影随形. *叹气* 我不后悔...这就是我的使命.
*看着他的手* 最终,深渊还是会赢... 火需要柴薪,而我..已经没什么可以烧的了. 痛楚..又回来了... *扶住左臂*
我只有一个,但我发誓那个被选中的不死人有九十九个,不知道为什么他有这么多. 让我想起了亚诺尔隆德. 我的手臂没那么疼了...
...
我的同伴...他死了! 就像一个人的时钟一样...我的十二点临近了... 只剩下一只狼.
滚回深渊! 剑起,魂断! 把它们送回深渊. 退散吧,邪物! 或许深渊能够被消灭... 我了解深渊!
它被污染了? 我们被黑暗包围了! 我不断地挥舞巨剑,但黑暗从未停下. ... 吸魂鬼?在这里? 不!我们要在这里拦下深渊,只有我们了! 我...不行... 不明智的一步. 对黑暗来说这微不足道... 我一无是处... 黑暗,吞噬我吧... 不要帮助我,我随时可能变成你的敌人... 黑暗吞噬了我... 不要在我身上白费力气了... 我变成了...深渊... 逃吧,凡人! 胜利或失败都一样...我还会是我吗? 不要相信虚无之物...要想着神圣的亚诺尔隆德 汝的信念比纯粹的黑暗更强大吗... 我...一无是处... 汝的信念比纯粹的黑暗更强大吗... 我行走在你们所不能及的深渊之中. 不要凝视深渊,而是穿过它. 聆听黑暗的低语,它会拯救你. 亚诺尔隆德在我心中. 你比那纯粹的黑暗更加邪恶! 做好牺牲的准备——一切都是值得的. 我的力量即是你的力量! 深渊从未散去. 每一步,黑暗都在消退! 希望之光在深渊中闪耀! 你不应该在出现在这里! 逃吧,凡人! 只剩下一片黑暗... 别想了,快逃! 你不能留下! 我没法控制住自己太久! 我...我看不到火光了... 王啊,黑暗无法被阻止... 我不够强...原谅我... 这只手不受我控制了! 在我被吞噬之前,快逃! 你越是挣扎,它越快赢. 快醒过来! 深渊太强大了! 如果你再拖延,它就会吞噬你. 撤退! 我会拖住它们,快走! 我拒绝扩散深渊的感染. 不.我必须直面黑暗. 没有效果. 没用. 它没有效. 别浪费资源了,快离开吧. 现在就是你的机会...快走,离开我.
-----------------------

Marchabysse Les Marchabysses suivent les traces du légendaire Chevalier du Loup, appelé à dompter les abysses et sauver la princesse d'un ancien royaume. Ils s'évertuent à mettre fin à l'existence de toute monstruosité abyssale au nom de ce grand guerrier. Ils maîtrisent l'espadon comme leur ancêtre, et leur équipement est fondé sur celui que ce dernier portait. Leur arme est bénie pour faire face aux créatures des abysses, et leur armure est fait d'un alliage léger pour garder une certaine liberté de mouvement.
Lutte Intérieure
Lutte Intérieure
Lutte Intérieure
Non. Sa tâche est ailleurs. La mienne est ici. Non. Sa tâche est ailleurs. La mienne est ici.
Selon les enseignements du loup, le Marchabysse, Champion de la Lumière, apprend à maitriser des techniques aggressives, mais agiles pour supprimer créatures abyssales. Cette agilité leur permet d'esquiver les attaques classiques. Connus pour leur loyauté, ils embrasseront les abysses pour sauver un allié.
Il inspire ses alliés par sa loyauté, faisant face aux abysses ou gagnant en force en les acceuillant.
Le loup exige un affrontement glorieux ! Au moins je ne suis pas là à garder une princesse...

not Lord's Blade Lord's Blade not Abysswalker Abysswalker
Si je peux me battre avec un bras manquant, tu peux arrêter de te plaindre ! Laisse moi de parler du loup... Seule la chair est meurtrie ! Crois moi, j'ai vu pire que ça !
Tout ira bien. J'ai encore mes deux bras, pour le moment ! Nous purifierons ce lieu de l'abysse ! Je te défendrai au péril de ma vie. J'en fais le serment.
En faisant preuve d'une telle agilité, tu arriveras probablement à esquiver... Un chevalier se définit par sa loyauté et son abnégation. Au final, même toi pourrait finir par en devenir un ! Si ça semble mal engagé, tiens fermement ce bouclier...
Les murmures des abysses ne m'atteignent pas. Je chasse les spectres sombres. Je suis incorruptible. Pour affronter les ténèbres, il faut devenir ténèbre.
Les ténèbres ont fini par troubler mes souvenirs... mais je me rappelle de toi. Tu me manques mon ami... Nous étions partenaires. *Sigh* Je n'ai pas de regret... ça fait parti de la vie.
*Regardant ses mains* Les abysses finiront peut être par l'emporter. La lumière doit être rallumée, mais je suis presque éteint. La douleur revient. *Tenant son bras gauche*
Je n'ai qu'une fiole, hum, il me semble que l'Elu en avait quatre-vingt-dix neuf. Je me demande comment il les a eus. Ca me rappelle Anor Londo. Mon bras n'est plus si mal en point.
...
Mon compagnion-- IL EST MORT ! L'horloge a sonné le glas de sa vie. La mienne attend le douxième coup. Il ne restera qu'un seul loup.
Retourne dans les abysses ! La lame chante sous les carcasses des ombres abyssales qui trépassent. Renvoyez les d'où ils viennent. Reculez, faibles créatures ! Nous pouvons peut être mettre fin à l'abysse... Je ne connais aucune tentation des ténèbres !
Soon, I may be consumed. Do not aid your potential enemy. Ne gaspillez pas votre nourriture. Je pourrais servir de repas. Pas maintenant ! Rrrrgh! Ne gaspillez pas votre nourriture. Je pourrais servir de repas. Pas maintenant ! Je n'ai servi à rien... Je n'ai servi à rien... Les murmures... les murmures des ténèbres! Reste concentré ! Est-ce contaminé ? Les ténèbres-- elles nous entourent ! Je ne cesse de les éviter, mais les ténèbres continuent de mettre sur mon chemin. ... un spectre sombre ? Ici ? Non ! Nous devons mettre fin ici à l'avancée des abysses, nul autre ne pourra plus le faire ! ... je ne puis. Un mouvement imprudent. Une tentative anectodique de mettre fin à l'avancée des ténèbres. Je n'ai servi à rien... Les ténèbres, ils me consumment... Ne tends pas la main à un ennemi potentiel ! Les ténèbres me consumment... Gardons l'attention sur moi. Je deviens l'ennemi... Fuyez, mortels ! Qu'on l'emporte ou non... resterai-je en vie ? Ne cède pas au vide. Regarde l'horizon en direction de la pieuse Anor Londo. Les tiens peuvent lutter contre les ténèbres infinies ! Je n'ai servi à rien... Les tiens ne sont rien d'autre que des ténèbres pures ! A travers les abysses, je suis allé là où nul autre n'a même posé le pied. Passe à travers les abysses, mais ne te laisse pas happer par elles. Tu es atteint pas les murmures des ténèbres. Je vais te sauver. Anor Londo continue de vivre à travers moi. Tu peux lutter contre les ténèbres infinies ! Prépare-toi au sacrifice-- la purification peut tout justifier. Ma force vous appartient ! Les abysses ne prendrons pas forme ici. Les ténèbres recullent à chacun de nos pas ! L'espoir point à travers l'abysse ! Tu ne devrais pas être ici ! Fuyez, mortels ! Les ténèbres, partout... Ne restez pas ici-- Fuyez ! Vous ne devez pas rester ici ! Je ne garderai pas le contrôle encore longtemps ! Je... je ne vois plus la flamme. Seigneur, les ténèbres ne seront jamais arrétées. Je n'ai pas été assez fort. Pardonnez moi. Je n'ai plus de contrôle sur mon bras ! Fuyez, avant que je ne sois consummé ! Plus long sera ton combat, plus rapide sera leur victoire. Mets fin à cette folie ! Les abysses sont trop fortes ! Vous serez consummés si vous restez. Retraite ! Je les retiens. Allez-y ! Je refuse de répandre les abysses. Non. Je dois faire face aux ténèbres. Sans effet. Inutile. Ce n'est pas efficace. Ne gaspillez pas vos forces. Allez-vous en. C'est la chance que vous attendiez-- laissez-moi là.
-------------------
Abysswalker Abysswalkers follow the tradition of the legendary Wolf Knight who was said to have conquered the abyss and saved a princess. They exist to slay all related monstrosities in honored memory of the Wolf Knight. Like their predecessor, they are unmatched with greatswords. Their weaponry and armor are fashioned after the Wolf Knight's. Their weapons are blessed to slay agents of the abyss and their spawn, and their armor remains light for movement.
Heroic Struggle
Heroic Struggle
Heroic Struggle
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The tradition of the Wolf, the Abysswalker, the Savior of Light, teaches an aggressive yet evasive set of skills for dispatching agents of the abyss. Their mobility allows evasion of conventional attacks. Renowned for their loyalty, they will embrace the Abyss if it means saving a comrade's life.
He inspires allies with his loyalty by overcoming the Abyss, or gains strength by welcoming it.
The wolf requires a worthy foe! At least I'm not guarding a princess...

not Lord's Blade Lord's Blade not Abysswalker Abysswalker
If I can fight with one limp and bloody arm, you can stop squirming! Let me tell you about my wolf... T'is only a flesh wound! Trust me, I've known worse!
We'll be fine. I've got both arms, now! We'll halt this odd land's abyss! I'll guard you with my life. I swear it.
If you move this way, they'll likely miss... A knight is defined by his loyalty and service. To that end, even you can become one! If it looks bad, take this shield...
I know nary a murmur of dark. I hunt Darkwraiths. This is no trouble. Through battle with Dark, I become Dark.
The darkness left my memories blurred... but I remember you. I miss you, my dearest companion... We were together, then. *Sigh* I have no regrets... such is duty.
*Looks upon his hands.* The Abyss will win, eventually. The Light requires kindling, and I'm nearly spent. The pain returns. *Clutches his left arm.*
I only have one, but I swear the Chosen Undead had ninety-nine. Not sure how he earned that many. Reminds me of Anor Londo. My arm's not so bad, any more.
...
My companion-- HE'S DEAD! This concerns a man with time on the clock. Twelve tolls for me, soon. Only one wolf remains.
Back to the Abyss! The twain shan't unite whilst my blade remains bitwixt. Send them back. Begone, foul creature! Perhaps the Abyss can be abated... I know nary a murmur of dark!
Soon, I may be consumed. Do not aid your potential enemy. Don't throw your food away. I could be corrupted. Not yet! Rrrrgh! Don't throw your food away. I could be corrupted. Not yet! I have availed you nothing... I have availed you nothing... Murmurs... Murmurs of Dark! Focus! Was it contaminated? The Dark-- it surrounds us! I keep swinging, but the Dark creeps ever onward. ... a darkwraith? Here? No! We end the Abyss here, or no one else will! ... I can't. An unwise step. A trivial attempt to halt the Dark. I have availed you nothing... Darkness, consume me... Do not aid a potential enemy! Darkness consume me... Don't risk losing the effort on me. I have become the enemy... Flee, mortals! Victory or defeat... will I remain? Do not accept the void. See through to holy Anor Londo. Surely thine kind are more than pure Dark! I have availed you nothing... Surely thine kind are more than pure Dark! I walk the Abyss where none may tread. Do not stare upon the Abyss, but drift through it. You know murmurs of Dark. It will save you. Anor Londo lives in me. Thou art more than pure dark! Be prepared for sacrifice-- the cost is well worth purity. My strength is yours! The Abyss will never leave here. The Dark recedes with each step! Hope shines within the Abyss! You should not be here! Flee, mortals! Only darkness... Do not tarry-- flee! Surely, you must not stay! I cannot restrain myself for long! I... I don't see the flame. My Lord, the Dark cannot be halted. I wasn't strong enough. Forgive me. This arm wills not what I ought! Flee, before I am corrupted! The longer you fight, the sooner it wins. Abandon this madness! The Abyss is too strong! It will consume you if you tarry. Retreat! I'll hold them off. Go! I refuse to spread the Abyss. No. I must face the Dark. No effect. No use. It's ineffective. Don't waste your resources. Just go. Now is your chance-- leave me.
-------------

Путник Бездны Путники Бездны соблюдают традиции легендарных Рыцарей Волков, которые завоевали Бездну и спасли свою принцессу. Они существуют чтобы убивать всех монстров в честь великого Рыцаря Волка. Как и их предки, Путники Бездны великолепно обращаются с длинным мечом. Их оружие и броня соответствуют облику Рыцаря Волка, а их оружие было благословленно убивать существ Бездны и им подобным, броня этих воинов освещает им путь.
Геройская борьба
Геройская борьба
Геройская борьба
Нет. Это не его задание, здесь нужен я. Нет. Это не его задание, здесь нужен я.
Традиции волков, Путник Бездны, спаситель света, очень эффективен в постоянном нападении и имеет довольно гибкий набор навыков для уничтожения агентов бездны. Их скорость позволяет им наносить самые эффективные атаки. Они верны, они готовы благословить Бездну если нужно, чтобы спасти товарища.
Он вдохновляет союзников своей верой в Бездну или получает силы встречая ее самостоятельно.
Волк требует достойного соперника! Хорошо, что не я охраняю принцессу...
Отрава темного призрака Бросок зверя Верность Уловка мечника Скользящий выпад Гнев Бездны Скользящий разрез Вдохновление Бездной Удар зверя Ураганный взмах Отрава темного призрака Бросок зверя Верность Уловка мечника Скользящий выпад Гнев Бездны Скользящий разрез Удар зверя Ураганный взмах

И только Путник Бездны можеть использовать данный предмет по назначению. Когда под эффектом Психоза, Путник Бездны получает скорость, защиту и силу Тьмы. Я остановлю Бездну!
Лечение ран Ободрение Душевный разговор Путник Бездны Воспоминания о лучших днях Прими Бездну Божественное благословение
Завет Арториаса Кольцо Волка Серебрянный кулон Решимость Путника Бездны Очищающий Великий Щит Синяя слеза Бездны Красная слеза Бездны Длинный меч Легенды Зараза Бездны
Не Клинок Повелителя Клинок Повелителя Не Путник Бездны Путник Бездны
Если я умею драться с одной рукой, то может тебе пора уже перестать корчиться от боли Позволь рассказать о моем верном товарище... Э-это всего лишь царапина! Поверь мне, бывало и хуже!
Все будет хорошо, у меня теперь обе руки! Мы остановим эту Бездну! Я буду защищать тебя ценой своей жизни, я клянусь.
Если попробуешь сделать как я говорю, все будет гораздо проще... Рыцарей определяет верность и служба. Ты даже можешь стать одним из них! Если все станет настолько плохо... Нет, не должно, но лучше возьми-ка этот щит...
Я знаю шепот тьмы. Я охочусь на темных духов, так, что это не проблема для меня. В битве с Темнотой, я стану самой Темнотой.
Тьма затуманила мой разум и мою память, но... Я помню тебя!. Я скучаю по тебе, мой дорогой товарищ... Когда-то мы были вместе. *Вздох* Я не должен сожалеть об этом... таков мой долг.
*Смотрит на свои руки.* Бездна побеждает. Без моих усилий света не будет, а я почти выдохся. Боль возвращается. *Хватается за левую руку.*
Это был последний, но я клянусь, что видел у Избранного Немертвого таких еще 99 штук. Не знаю где он столько взял. Это напоминает мне об Анор Лондо. Моей руке уже лучше, однозначно лучше.
...
Мой спутник... -- ОН МЕРТВ! Пока что это меня не заботит. Но двенадцать последних ударов колокола скоро прозвучат и для меня. Остался только один волк.
Назад! В Бездну! Двое не могут быть одним целым пока мой клинок разделяет их. Отправляйся туда откуда пришел. Сгинь, глупое существо! Похоже Бездна ослабла... Я знаю шепот тьмы!
Меня скоро поглотит Бездна, лучше не помогай своему потенциальному врагу. Не тратьте на меня еду, я все равно искажен Бездной. Погоди! Rrrrgh! Не тратьте на меня еду, я искажен Бездной. Погоди! Я вас подвел... Я вас подвел... Шепот... Шепот темноты! Сфокусируйся! Было ли оно заражено? Темнота-- она нас окружает! Я продолжу разгонять Темноту, но она все еще подбирается к нам. ... Темный призрак? Здесь? Нет! Мы покончим с Бездной здесь, никто кроме нас больше не сможет! ... Я не могу. Может пойдем другим путем? Жалкая попытка, вам остановить Темноту. Я вас подвел... Тьма, поглотит меня... Не помогай своему потенциальному врагу! Тьма, поглотит меня... Не трать свои силы на меня. Я же ваш враг... Бегите в ужасе, смертные! Победа или поражение это не важно... Важно останусь ли я самим собой? Не впускайте пустоту. Посмотрите на святой Анор Лондо. Ты можешь стать великим, это явно лучше твои темные души! Я вас подвел... Ты можешь стать великим, это явно лучше твои темные души! Я бывал в Бездне, где не ступала ничья нога. Не смотри в Бездну, но попытайся ее победить Ты знаешь шепот Темноты. Он спасет тебя. Анор Лондо живет во мне. Ты сильнее чистой Темноты! Будь готов к жертве -- цена достойная чистоты. Моя сила теперь твоя! Бездна никогда меня не отпустит. Похоже, что Темнота отступает с каждым шагом! Надежда сияет внутри Бездны! Тебе здесь не рады! Бегите в ужасе, смертные! Только тьма... Не медли -- беги! Тебе здесь не рады! Я не смогу слишком долго держать себя под контролем! Я... Я не вижу пламя. Мой Господин, мне не остановить Темноту. Я был слаб. Простите меня. Эта рука меня не слушается! Бегите, пока я не искажен до конца! Чем дольше дерешься, тем выше шанс, что она победит. Оставь это безумие! Бездна слишком сильна! Если будешь медлить она тебя поглотит. Отступай! Я задержу их. Бегите! Я не буду распространять Бездну! Нет! Я обязан выстоять против Темноты. Эффекта не будет. Не нужно. Бесполезно. Не тратьте ресурсы, просто уходите. Это ваш шанс -- оставьте меня.
---------------------
Abysswalker Abysswalkers follow the tradition of the legendary Wolf Knight who was said to have conquered the abyss and saved a princess. They exist to slay all related monstrosities in honored memory of the Wolf Knight. Like their predecessor, they are unmatched with greatswords. Their weaponry and armor are fashioned after the Wolf Knight's. Their weapons are blessed to slay agents of the abyss and their spawn, and their armor remains light for movement.
Heroic Struggle
Heroic Struggle
Heroic Struggle
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The tradition of the Wolf, the Abysswalker, the Savior of Light, teaches an aggressive yet evasive set of skills for dispatching agents of the abyss. Their mobility allows evasion of conventional attacks. Renowned for their loyalty, they will embrace the Abyss if it means saving a comrade's life.
He inspires allies with his loyalty by overcoming the Abyss, or gains strength by welcoming it.
The wolf requires a worthy foe! At least I'm not guarding a princess...
Darkwraith's Bane Savage Leap Loyalty Swordsman's Gambit Gliding Thrust Wrath of the Abyss Gliding Slash Abyssal Imbuement Savage Strike Hurricane Swing Darkwraith's Bane Savage Leap Loyalty Swordsman's Gambit Gliding Thrust Wrath of the Abyss Gliding Slash Savage Strike Hurricane Swing

+5 stress healed when afflicted Extra Stress Healed When Afflicted More Stress, More Damage Gain Unique Bonuses When Afflicted Shard of the Abyssal Father The Abyss corrupts all it touches, granting extreme stress. Only an Abysswalker can utilize this properly. When afflicted, Abysswalkers gain speed, protection, and strength in pure darkness. Greatly enhanced damage against Eldritch and Unholy. Noble Corrupted Lord's Blade
Unmatched with the greatsword, this warrior would surely aid your endeavors. He hunts the Dark itself. Abysswalker's Legacy

Corrupted Noble

not Lord's Blade Lord's Blade not Abysswalker Abysswalker
If I can fight with one limp and bloody arm, you can stop squirming! Let me tell you about my wolf... T'is only a flesh wound! Trust me, I've known worse!
We'll be fine. I've got both arms, now! We'll halt this odd land's abyss! I'll guard you with my life. I swear it.
If you move this way, they'll likely miss... A knight is defined by his loyalty and service. To that end, even you can become one! If it looks bad, take this shield...
I know nary a murmur of dark. I hunt Darkwraiths. This is no trouble. Through battle with Dark, I become Dark.
The darkness left my memories blurred... but I remember you. I miss you, my dearest companion... We were together, then. *Sigh* I have no regrets... such is duty.
*Looks upon his hands.* The Abyss will win, eventually. The Light requires kindling, and I'm nearly spent. The pain returns. *Clutches his left arm.*
I only have one, but I swear the Chosen Undead had ninety-nine. Not sure how he earned that many. Reminds me of Anor Londo. My arm's not so bad, any more.
...
My companion-- HE'S DEAD! This concerns a man with time on the clock. Twelve tolls for me, soon. Only one wolf remains.
Back to the Abyss! The twain shan't unite whilst my blade remains bitwixt. Send them back. Begone, foul creature! Perhaps the Abyss can be abated... I know nary a murmur of dark!
Soon, I may be consumed. Do not aid your potential enemy. Don't throw your food away. I could be corrupted. Not yet! Rrrrgh! Don't throw your food away. I could be corrupted. Not yet! I have availed you nothing... I have availed you nothing... Murmurs... Murmurs of Dark! Focus! Was it contaminated? The Dark-- it surrounds us! I keep swinging, but the Dark creeps ever onward. ... a darkwraith? Here? No! We end the Abyss here, or no one else will! ... I can't. An unwise step. A trivial attempt to halt the Dark. I have availed you nothing... Darkness, consume me... Do not aid a potential enemy! Darkness consume me... Don't risk losing the effort on me. I have become the enemy... Flee, mortals! Victory or defeat... will I remain? Do not accept the void. See through to holy Anor Londo. Surely thine kind are more than pure Dark! I have availed you nothing... Surely thine kind are more than pure Dark! I walk the Abyss where none may tread. Do not stare upon the Abyss, but drift through it. You know murmurs of Dark. It will save you. Anor Londo lives in me. Thou art more than pure dark! Be prepared for sacrifice-- the cost is well worth purity. My strength is yours! The Abyss will never leave here. The Dark recedes with each step! Hope shines within the Abyss! You should not be here! Flee, mortals! Only darkness... Do not tarry-- flee! Surely, you must not stay! I cannot restrain myself for long! I... I don't see the flame. My Lord, the Dark cannot be halted. I wasn't strong enough. Forgive me. This arm wills not what I ought! Flee, before I am corrupted! The longer you fight, the sooner it wins. Abandon this madness! The Abyss is too strong! It will consume you if you tarry. Retreat! I'll hold them off. Go! I refuse to spread the Abyss. No. I must face the Dark. No effect. No use. It's ineffective. Don't waste your resources. Just go. Now is your chance-- leave me.
----------------

My companion-- HE'S DEAD! This concerns a man with time on the clock. Twelve tolls for me, soon. Only one wolf remains.
Back to the Abyss! The twain shan't unite whilst my blade remains bitwixt. Send them back. Begone, foul creature! Perhaps the Abyss can be abated... I know nary a murmur of dark!
Soon, I may be consumed. Do not aid your potential enemy. Don't throw your food away. I might not make it. Not yet! Rrrrgh! Don't throw your food away. I might not make it. Not yet! I have availed you nothing... I have availed you nothing... Focus! Focus! Focus! Murmurs... Murmurs of Dark! Focus! The light fades... The battle never ends. Once, I lost my Silver Pendant. It was the end of me. Don't trust it. Was it contaminated? The Dark-- it surrounds us! I keep swinging, but the Dark creeps ever onward. ... a darkwraith? Here? No! We end the Abyss here, or no one else will! ... I can't. An unwise step. A trivial attempt to halt the Dark. I have availed you nothing... Darkness, consume me... Do not aid a potential enemy! Darkness consume me... Don't risk losing the effort on me. I have become the enemy... Flee, mortals! Victory or defeat... will I remain? Do not accept the void. See through to holy Anor Londo. Surely thine kind are more than pure Dark! I have availed you nothing... Surely thine kind are more than pure Dark! I walk the Abyss where none may tread. Do not stare upon the Abyss, but drift through it. You know murmurs of Dark. It will save you. Anor Londo lives in me. Thou art more than pure dark! Be prepared for sacrifice-- the cost is well worth purity. My strength is yours! The Abyss will never leave here. The Dark recedes with each step! Hope shines within the Abyss! You should not be here! Flee, mortals! Only darkness... Do not tarry-- flee! Surely, you must not stay! I cannot restrain myself for long! I... I don't see the flame. My Lord, the Dark cannot be halted. I wasn't strong enough. Forgive me. This arm wills not what I ought! Flee, before I am corrupted! The longer you fight, the sooner it wins. Abandon this madness! The Abyss is too strong! It will consume you if you tarry. Retreat! I'll hold them off. Go! I refuse to spread the Abyss. No. I must face the Dark. No effect. No use. It's ineffective. Don't waste your resources. Just go. Now is your chance-- leave me.
